result.reason: Feasible enhancement to allow selecting database environment on startup. Can be implemented by adding a new setting and injecting a selection dialog (reusing existing SQL config UI) into the startup sequence.
result.approach: 1. Add `ShowDatabasePickerOnStartup` setting to OptionsDBsPage. 2. Update `SqlServerPage` UI to include a checkbox for this setting. 3. Create a new form `FrmPickDatabase` that hosts an instance of `SqlServerPage` (or similar controls) to allow modifying DB settings. 4. In `Runtime.LoadConnections`, check the new setting and if enabled, show `FrmPickDatabase` before attempting to load connections.
